about.intro: Hey there! I'm Rakesh – a passionate architect, curious traveler, and lover of all things tech. I am a results-oriented Senior Technical Consultant with 15+ years of hands-on experience driving Digital Transformation and Advanced DevSecOps at the enterprise level. Currently serving as a Trusted Advisor at Red Hat, I specialize in aligning complex technical solutions with customer business outcomes.
about.expertise: My expertise spans the entire Software Delivery Lifecycle, from architecture and development to cloud deployment and operations across AWS, Azure, and OpenShift. I excel at orchestrating technical teams and implementing CI/CD pipelines that drive measurable business results.
about.personal: When I'm not architecting solutions, I'm likely planning my next travel adventure with my family, discovering new cuisines, or chasing after my little ones. I share my technical insights and experiences on my blog, where you'll find detailed articles on cloud-native technologies, DevSecOps, and enterprise architecture.
